title: Ece in pes worth it through management quota??
content: Or else should I choose cse in some lower clg like nmit,RNSIT through management quota

comments.body: Even cse is not worth for 50+ lakhs
Do u have any other options without the management quota
Mit manipal cps,mit blr ee vlsi but nmit,RNSIT and manipal fees will be same!!
Go with MIT CPS I'd say. MIT is too much fun+ lower intake so placements would be decent ig. I'm an ECE fresher btw

I wd hv got it in round 5 but I didn't attend counseling 
I am not sure they do another round
RNSIT is kinda weird bro, been there for kcet exam, they told 7lpa for cse, might as well pay for pes atp
Ig talk to an senior from cps (mit)
what is the fees through management quota

Cse 12 lak 
Ece 7 lak in pesu
In nmit RNSIT it's 7 lak for cse,ise
then why some people says that it is nearly 50 lakh for cse

yeah same i wrote my kcet there   
bruh 7lpa isin't worth for that college
